name: Dungeon Crawl (DonovannSmit)
description:
Description: 

          Your trying to find your way out of this dungeon, but you have seem to be lost in an endless loop! Is this the work of an evil sorcerer?! No matter! You are determined to find your way out of this hellish labyrinth. Get as far as you can while avoiding the goblins and skeletons that seem to be littering this place. Collecting some gems along the way might be good as well, for when you finally escape this place...

Controls: 

          Press SPACEBAR to jump over enemies.

Music/Sounds:

"Leaving Home" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
